hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
CENGN=slittle@build.starlingx.cengn.ca RSYNC_SSH="ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -i $HOME/.ssh/cengn" RSYNC_SUDO="--rsync-path=sudo /usr/bin/rsync"
rsync -avuzH -e "$RSYNC_SSH" --progress --exclude='*.new/' $CENGN:/export/mirror/centos /localdisk/backups/CENGN/export/mirror/
rsync -avuzH -e "$RSYNC_SSH" --progress --exclude='*.new/' $CENGN:/export/mirror/debian /localdisk/backups/CENGN/export/mirror/
rsync -avuzH -e "$RSYNC_SSH" --progress $CENGN:/export/mirror/starlingx/rc /localdisk/backups/CENGN/export/mirror/starlingx/
rsync -avuzH -e "$RSYNC_SSH" --progress $CENGN:/export/mirror/starlingx/release /localdisk/backups/CENGN/export/mirror/starlingx/
rsync -avuzH -e "$RSYNC_SSH" "$CENGN:/var/lib/jenkins/*.xml" "/localdisk/backups/CENGN/var/lib/jenkins/"
rsync -avuzH -e "$RSYNC_SSH" "$CENGN:/var/lib/jenkins/bin" "/localdisk/backups/CENGN/var/lib/jenkins/"
sudo /usr/bin/rsync -avuzH -e "$RSYNC_SSH" "$RSYNC_SUDO" "$CENGN:/localdisk/designer/jenkins/*rc-*" "/localdisk/backups/CENGN/localdisk/designer/" || $(case "$?" in 0|23) exit 0 ;; *) exit $?; esac)
sudo /usr/bin/rsync -avuzH -e "$RSYNC_SSH" "$RSYNC_SUDO" "$CENGN:/localdisk/loadbuild/jenkins/*rc-*" "/localdisk/backups/CENGN/localdisk/loadbuild/"
rsync -avuzH -e "$RSYNC_SSH" --exclude '/*/*/*/' -f"+ */" -f"+ config.xml" -f"- *" "$CENGN:/var/lib/jenkins/jobs" "/localdisk/backups/CENGN/var/lib/jenkins/"
